happy.heading: A happy Learning Environment
happy.text: Our objective is to ignite a lifelong passion for learning. By challenging the advanced and uplifting the less assured, we ensure each pupil realise their unique academic potential that can help him be an inspiration the world needs.

visit_text: Experience first hand hospitality, creativity, and a child-based culture in the teaching/learning process.

academic.heading: Academic Excellence
academic.text: Dynamic instruction at Signal School fosters intellectual curiosity, autonomy, and self-assurance. We inspire girls and boys to cultivate distinctiveness in character and innovative thought. This has made our Pupils icons of community transformation.

headteacher_message: At Signal School, our guiding principle is 'Aim High, Be Kind, and Dare to save mother earth'. This is deeply rooted at our core and combined with exceptional teaching.
footer_tagline: Mentoring a co-existing generation with creativity, innovation, and environmental respect.
ethos_text_continued: Child Art, Child Waste Management, Child Kitchen Gardening, and Child Sports are key in our teaching-learning process.
join_heading: Join us and play your part.
ethos_text_conclusion: Signal Preparatory School offers an environment where pupils are daily inspired both by the lessons in the classroom and the serenity outside.

programs.title: Child Art.
programs.description: Art is a unique style of bringing an imagination to reality. At Signal Preparatory School, we equip our pupils with child art skills to spark their creativity and team working abilities.

programs.title: Child Waste Management
programs.description: With the adopted slogan, "Waste is Waste if Wasted", at Signal School, we equip learners with the art of managing waste. We emphasize the 5R's of waste management to our pupils. We aim to empower ambassadors who will make Mother Earth a better place to live in.

Children learn much more through play. The more they play is the more they learn. And the more they learn is the more they play. This improves their problem solving skills, collaboration and creativity.
programs.title: Child Sports
Music, Dance and drama
programs.description: Music is the language of the soul. At Signal School, Music Dance and Drama drives the mood of learning. It improves the confidence and communication skills, creativity, team working, positive competition among others.

programs.title: School Guests and Visitations
programs.description: With the best hospitality ever, great moments are shared with our guests. Our doors are open to Love and sharing. Folk stories, Drama presentations, Miming, Poetry, Child Art, Waste management skills are shared among others. We also move to schools and communities for child to child experience.

ethos_text: At Signal Preparatory School, our ethos goes beyond academia. We believe in nurturing the whole child, promoting co-existence, creativity, and global awareness.

visit_text_continued: Be part of our movement. Visit and leave a mark of Peace, Love, and Kindness that the generation will celebrate for a life time.
about_text:
<!--StartFragment-->

Signal Preparatory is a school aiming at mentoring a coexisting generation with high levels of creativity, Innovations, world awareness and respect for Environmental Conservation in Children and young Adults.

Iï»¿t is located in one of the suburbs of Mpondwe Lhubiriha Town Council. Children are exposed to high levels of domestic violence, drug abuse, poor drainage and waste management, stereotypes, among others in this community. This horrible exposure sets fertile grounds for negative mindset hence self denial, low esteem, risks of diseases among others in children. As most institutions focus on youth, mothers and grownups, we thought it important to concentrate  on children and young adults through education.  

The truth is that every child deserves better. 

Inspired by Proverbs 22:6, "Train up a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not depart from it", Signal got its humble beginning.

We use Child Art, Music, Sport and Drama to bring hope, empower and transform mindset of community children. 

<!--EndFragment-->
